assets.title: Composable DropDown with Animation

annotations.text: This snippet is from lines (49,109) inside the file MainActivity.kt and from project learnCompose.

This code creates a DropDown widget with text, modifier, and content. It also includes animations for clicking on the button or icon if it is opened by remember to be clicked in an open state of type draggable

This code snippet defines a composable function called "DropDown" that creates a dropdown menu. It takes in parameters such as text, modifier, initiallyOpened, and content. It uses animation to control the opening and closing of the dropdown menu, and displays
